citations.desc: ACCESS AND INSPECTION OF RECORDS AND PROPERTY; SUBMISSION OF ITINERARIES.
citations.narrative:
A responsible adult was not available to accompany APHIS Officials during the inspection process at 1:15 pm on
10-SEP-18.
Site manager was contacted by calling the facility's telephone on file, and confirmed the unavailability of any facility
representative.
